item.title: Halo: Reach
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:54, topic:358845”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=455343.msg3352753#msg3352753 date=1285502126]
…
[/quote]
Oh I’m not trying to bitch about it, I’m just asking. I’m personally against boosting because I like the challenge.

Shitty about the network issues, I saw a little warning about it but didn’t really know much about it.[/quote]

Oh no worries then. I’m against boosting in the ranked game, for instance Halo3 level 50s with bugger all total games. When it comes to the credits I see they buy things that make you look better and nothing else so I really don’t mind. Doing certain commendations legitimately is fair enough but in 6 months time I imagine most people will have a lot maxed out and they’ll become redundant. If anything the better players will try and make new accounts with very little commendation percentage and probably try and get them into onyx league, similar to level 50s with little XP in previous halos.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo: Reach
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:47, topic:358845”][quote author=cumescape link=topic=455343.msg3351090#msg3351090 date=1285336645]
I’ve been playing a bit much, I should have Lt. Colonel in a few days time.

http://www.bungie.net/Stats/Reach/default.aspx?player=KSI%20Crashdown
[/quote]
you boosting, bro?[/quote]

That gets you credits, credits get you cosmetic rewards. It’s not actually boosting. Boosting in halo generally involves the ranked game and the new team arena can’t be boosted afaik. I’ve been arguing with people on bungie about this… heh. It’s like ‘boosting’ your ACES in Rainbow Six, just grinding and reloading a certain checkpoint over and over (plus countless other games). Before games had online we were doing this in all games with stats, once it goes online and people have the chance to become jealous at each other it just gets bitchy and pathetic.

Each to his own, I grinded about 40 mins to get onyx in splash damage since I know I’m NEVER going to do the campaign enough with heavy weapons. If someone wants to spend hours and do it for all commendations then fair enough. Talented players will only really care about Arena and KD ratio.

Offtopic from that, I got my rating at my friends house with shit internet, we got kicked out of several games with network issues. Anyway, because it thinks im a quitter i’ve ended up in a shit league and I get banned for 15mins if I lag out of a game. Bah.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo: Reach
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The arena is a nice substitute, but I play Rumble Pit a lot, and I get tired of all the 12 year olds seeing Infection and going “OMFG ZOMBIES L0L0L0L0L0L.” I’ve played probably 9 infection games, and then 5 head hunter games in a row before I finally gave up on anything that involved other players. Score Attack is nice if you need a break, along with Forging that new map you’ve had in your head for a while.

Read full topic
